DOC.detailed_description: 120 participant diabetic neuropathy screen endocrine metabolism clinic Taichung Veterans General Hospital Chinese Medical University Hospital . Subjects randomly distribute double-blind , 12 week , placebo-controlled procedure . Subjects measure MNSI , SF-BPI , SF-36 , SF -MCQ , NCV , AC sugar , HbA1c , lipid profile , liver kidney function . Safety evaluation include GPT creatinine reveal deterioration treatment . Several domain MNSI , SF-BPI , SF-36 , SF -MPQ questionnaires reveal significant improvement . F-wave peroneal , tibial nerve distal latency tibial nerve objective nerve conduction study reveal significant improvement .
